messages.content: What was the refining capacity in the financial year 2016-17, and how much crude oil was processed in that year?
In the financial year 2016-17, the refining capacity was 234.0 MMTPA, and the crude oil processed was 240 MMTPA.
How did the refining capacity change from the financial year 2016-17 to 2017-18, and what was the percentage increase in crude oil processing during the same period?

From the financial year 2016-17 to 2017-18, the refining capacity increased from 234.0 MMTPA to 247.6 MMTPA, which is an increase of 13.6 MMTPA or approximately 5.8%. The crude oil processing increased from 240 MMTPA to 250 MMTPA, marking a percentage increase of approximately 4.17%.
What was the highest refining capacity reported in the given data table, in which financial year was it recorded, and how much crude oil was processed in that year?

The highest refining capacity reported was 251.2 MMTPA, which was recorded in the financial years 2021-22 and 2022-23, with crude oil processing being 240 MMTPA and 250 MMTPA respectively in those years.
During which financial year did crude oil processing experience the largest drop compared to the previous year, and what was the amount of the decrease?
The largest drop in crude oil processing compared to the previous year occurred in the financial year 2020-21, with a decrease of 32 MMTPA from the previous year's processing of 252 MMTPA.
By the end of the financial year 2022-23, what was the total increase in refining capacity since 2016-17, and how did crude oil processing in 2022-23 compare to the 2016-17 level?

By the end of the financial year 2022-23, the total increase in refining capacity since 2016-17 was 17.2 MMTPA, from 234.0 MMTPA to 251.2 MMTPA. The crude oil processing in 2022-23 was 250 MMTPA, which is an increase of 10 MMTPA compared to the 2016-17 level of 240 MMTPA.
In the financial year 2020-21, what was the crude oil processing figure, and how did it compare to the refining capacity of that year?
In the financial year 2020-21, the crude oil processing figure was 220 MMTPA, which was significantly lower than the refining capacity of that year, which remained at 249.9 MMTPA.
Generate a table that outlines the refining capacity in MMTPA alongside the actual crude oil processing in MMTPA for each financial year from 2016-17 to 2022-23.
